full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 105 of 228 781 LC2Qmax3 Alessi - Direct working for him, that's it. Q. How many structures were on Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach property? A. In the beginning, it was just the main house and the pool house. At the end -- almost at the end of my staying there, they constructed a staff quarters. There was a house separate from the main residence, and it was in there there were three bathrooms, three bedrooms, a small living room, dining room, and it was a very large laundry room, the staff house. Q. That third structure, that staff house, about when was it built? A. I have to say 1999, 2000. Q. Do you remember the cabana being on the property the entire time you worked for Mr. Epstein? A. Yes, I do. Q. What color was the main house when you first started working for Mr. Epstein? A. The main house was white, and I painted, and it was pink after I painted. Q. Was it still pink when you left in 2002? A. Yes, it was still pink. Q. Other than Mr. Epstein, who else, if anyone, gave you instructions about your job responsibilities during your employment? A. Ms. Maxwell. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012390
